name: Gravity Sucks
description:
Help the little robot jump from planetoid to planetoid and collect all the shiny stars... But what out for the aliens and don't run out of power!

In this game your task is to get the little robot to the mothership by jumping between planetoids while collecting stars and avoiding aliens. Each jump uses power, so make sure to collect any batteries that you find on the way.

The procedurally generated game was made a while ago for the Ludum Dare event.

CONTROLS:

Left Arrow: Move left

Right Arrow: Move right

Up Arrow: Jump
